item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

It's time again to schedule some time for the Boston Karaoke Meetup!

The group had a wonderful time at Courtside Restaurant and Pub last month, so I've decided to hold it there again. The room where we sang in was quite spacious and the song selection was good. There are multiple monitors available for lyrics and it was definitely a fun time.

We have the Karaoke System reserved just for us with our very own KJ host for the entire two hours, so please try to come at 7PM to get maximum singing time.

Look forward to seeing all of you there.

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my name tag,but if you can't find me call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - February 2009
